project.name: OpenO
project.description: OpenOSP EMR is a web-based electronic medical record (EMR) system.

configuration.argLine: -Xmx2048m -Dnet.bytebuddy.experimental=true --add-opens java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.lang.reflect=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/sun.reflect=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/sun.nio.ch=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.io=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED
